attributes.action: Make Financial Management part of the curriculum in UK Schools
attributes.additional_details: Most recently, I gave a presentation at Hackney Community College, London.
attributes.background: I am a financial planner and have presented to children across schools in the UK. It is apparent that schools do not teach the basics of money management. If our young leave school with the basics, they can rely less on the state and build for their future better, and with lower amounts of debt
